features: TRADITIONALLY CRAFTED SOAP - Using old-world methods in the French Provence produces a soap that has few impurities and an incredibly smooth texture which creates a longer lasting soap
FEEL THE LUXURY - Pre de Provence luxurious soaps creates a rich, creamy lather to moisturize and softens your skin
BEAUTIFUL FRAGRACE - Made with quality ingredients our soap bars will fill your bathroom with delicious scents down to the very last sliver of soap
THE PERFECT HOUSEHOLD SOAP - Use in every bathroom, in the kitchen, or give it away in a luxury infused gift basket for bridal, baby shower, or mother's day gifts
FRENCH ARTISANAL SOAP, NO IMMITATIONS - No animal testing, Free of Parabens, Ethyl Alcohol and Sodium Lauryl Sulfate
body.description: Artisanal Soaps Created with Natural IngredientsFor centuries, the luxury of French-milled soaps has remained the gold standard of excellence. Each time you begin to lather with French made soap, you enter a time and place where quality and craftsmanship have stood still. Traditional French soap is triple-milled to produce a completely uniform and smooth soap, without impurities, thus lasting longer.Each bar of Pré de Provence soap is not only carefully made today by dedicated soap makers in Provence following their proud traditions, but quad-milled to be smoother and have a richer lather to create our luxurious feel.Using all pure, natural ingredients enriched with shea butter, you can feel the difference of our unique quad-milling process. Aromatic fragrances transport you into a moment of calmness, vitality, dreaming, or well-being.Different Sizes AvailableWe offer soaps in a large 250 gram bar and a small 150 gram bar bursting with natural fragrance. Over 30 scents are available and you are sure to find a favorite, or two, or three. Traditional French soap is triple-milled to produce a completely uniform and smooth soap, without impurities, thus lasting longer. Every bar of Pre de Provence soap is not only carefully made today by the dedicated soap makers in Provence following their proud traditions, but quad-milled to be smoother and have a richer lather to create our luxurious feel.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pré de Provence Specialty Soaps Shea Butter Infused & Quad-Milled For Luxurious, Long Lasting Soap For centuries, the luxury of French-milled soaps has remained the gold standard of excellence. Each time you begin to lather with French made soap, you enter a time and place where quality and craftsmanship have stood still. Traditional French soap is triple-milled to produce a completely uniform and smooth soap, without impurities, thus lasting longer. Each bar of Pré de Provence soap is not only carefully made today by dedicated soap makers in Provence following their proud traditions, but quad-milled to be smoother and have a richer lather to create our luxurious feel. More From Pré de Provence Men's No. 63 Skincare Bath Salts & Bubble Bath Lotions & Body Butter Hand & Foot Creams Argan Oil & Scrubs

About Pré de Provence Created from the finest of natural ingredients, Pré de Provence products are meticulously fashioned in Provence by French artisans following traditions established generations ago. We find our inspiration here, where fields of lavender, wild flowers, herbs, fruits and vegetables, and the fresh sea air abound. Extreme pride and care is the foundation for everything we create, upholding the quality, artistry and authenticity demanded of products 'Made in France'. Nature casts a magical spell on this haven in southern France, nestled between sky-reaching mountains and the Mediterranean Sea. The skies shine blue, endless mineral-rich waters sparkle, and verdant meadows abound with fragrant treasures of lavender, wildflowers, herbs, fruits and vegetables. Just breathing the wonderful scents in the air brings peace and tranquility.

Not all French Soaps are created equal... Quad-Milled Soap Traditional French soap is triple-milled to produce a completely uniform and smooth soap, without impurities, thus lasting longer. Every bar of Pre de Provence soap is not only carefully made today by the dedicated soap makers in Provence following their proud traditions, but quad-milled to be smoother and have a richer lather to create our luxurious feel. Shea Butter Soap Bar Using all pure, natural ingredients enriched with shea butter, you can feel the difference between regular soap and French Soap. Aromatic fragrances transport you to a moment of calmness, vitality, dreaming, or well-being. Bring the meadows of Provence into your world with our ultra rich, wonderfully scented specialty soaps available in a 250g & 150g bar. Discover Our Men's Line No. 63 We are known for our excellent soap but we have a lot more to offer. Discover our No. 63 Men's skincare collection, our shea butter lotions and butters, relaxing bath salts, our citrus and lavender argan oil collection, and our full range of soaps including Italian and guest soaps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice soap
reviews.reviewText: Cleans well and doesn't leave my skin feeling dry. Scent is negligible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Bar Soap Ever
reviews.reviewText: I love all their soaps. They are very moisturizing and smell amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sensuous shower experience!
reviews.reviewText: It's entirely possible to love a bar of soap and look forward to a long hot bath or shower based on a sensory experience that this soap can give you.I have purchased numorous bars of Pre De Provence soaps and none of them have disappointed me. The rose, mint leaf, sea salt, lime zest, and ocean air being my favorites. Of these the rose and mint leaf are my top two.The lather is fantastic, the scents are just perfect, and they leave my skin soft and not dried out.I traded my normally $20.00 a bottle bath gel for this bar soap and I don't think I will ever return. It's fabulous!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bar soap lathers well
reviews.reviewText: The bar of Pre de Provence soap arrived in a medium sized Amazon bubble pack and the bar was enclosed only in a clear cellophane wrapper. The bar was smashed in on all 8 corners; it wouldn't look good if it was to be given as a gift. I purchased the Milk scent and the bar lathers very well and it’s a creamy lather - I do have soft water. My skin only had a very light smell of the Milk scent after my shower. The Milk scent is hard to describe - a soothing light floral and light baby powder. The 150 gram bar is a good size, a slight bit larger than a bar of soap you'd purchase at the grocery store. To get an idea of the size of this bar most boxes of grocery bar soap have the ounces and grams printed on them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The smell doesn't last all to long, but the soap is great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: The bar of soap itself lasts as long as the average soap bar, but the scent doesn't seem to last through the entire lifespan of the bar. That probably has something to do with the fact that it's a more natural option without all the chemicals that the big name store bought soaps have. That being the case, these are great for sensitive skin. The shea butter helps to moisturize really well too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells Like Soap From My Grandparents’ Bathroom
reviews.reviewText: We got the Pre de Provence “Milk” scented quad-milled bath soap in 150ml. Smells clean, pleasant, and like bursts of nostalgia for washing up before family dinner. Washes clean, rinses cleaner, and our skin seems to enjoy it, too. As our 150g bar will probably become a sliver by the end of the week, we have a 250g of the same variety waiting to take its place.If any people from Pre de Provence are peering at this, please make a shave soap with this scent. I’m told the lathers of the Bergamot and Thyme and the 63 are better than the soaps I currently use, but I’m not interested due to the scents. The milk scent, though, I love it! I’d love to load my brush with this scent for my nightly whisker removal. Please make it happen. Also, my family loves the bath soap as is. Perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Appealing scent, appealing price for nice quality product
reviews.reviewText: A luxury item, looks that feels and smells like pricier items. Shea soaps are always lovely and this product is no exception. Nice if you are keeping for your own bathroom but not great to present as a gift. While the soap has a pretty design on top, it is wrapped in clear cello with packaging information on the side and it could be more nicely presented for wrapping appeal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product Excellent quality
reviews.reviewText: One of the few things available on Amazon still worth ordering. The best soap bar I've used in a long time.

Smells great! But it is much smaller than what is shown in the picture… must be a child’s hand holding the bar of soap because it is not that big! But smells great and leave skin feeling fantastic. Is pricey but would def buy again
Liked everything about this product. The whole room smells wonderful.

reviews.reviewTitle: I wish I could just have a subscription to get this soap monthly
reviews.reviewText: Smells absolutely fantastic - you HAVE to try it.
Nice quality soap and is not drying.
